root.name: Chubby Cherub
root.description: Overview In the Japanese release from 1985 you play as Q-tarō the ghost, and in the North American port you play as Chubby Cherub, a sort of Cupid-like character. Your goal is to save your friends, while avoiding enemies such as beagles, bulldogs and angry cats. It's 12 levels long, and at the end of each level the player will find one of their friends.
